title: Halo Series Premiere Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.24.22
description:
Greg and Tim talk about early Halo reviews, WWE sticking with 2K, buying Cal Kestis' lightsaber, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:40 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Tik Tok continues to put out some bangers, today you can find a horrifying clip of Greg trying desperately to scan his face into WWE 2k22. https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames
While you’re there, check out my A Memoir Blue review!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report   -
00:07:38 - Halo Series Premiere Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.24.22
00:17:26 - Fortnite Sticking with No Build Mode for a While, Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:25:19 - WWE Sticking with 2K
00:32:56 -  Ad
00:35:50 -  Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Now Includes Marvel Unlimited, Wesley Leblac @ GI
00:41:00 - Rainbow Six Mobile? Tom Henderson @ Exputer
00:49:15 - You’re Getting an NFL VR game EVERY YEAR, Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:50:00 - You can get Cal Kestis’ Lightsaber at Galaxy’ Edge now
00:54:00 - Out today
00:56:35 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Bless
